snippet.title: Tower of Greed - Kongregate Impossible Badge Run Part 1
snippet.description: Here's part 1 of a play-though of me playing Tower of Greed on Kongregate.  This run will gain the $500,000 needed to earn the Impossible Badge (although I already had the badge prior to this run).  Hopefully by watching this, you'll see some helpful hints on how to maximize your score, and make that badge a little easier to attain.
